toyotama.crypto.rsa.lsb_decryption_oracle_attack(n, e, c, oracle, progress=True)¶
oracle: method

decryption oracle c*2**e = (2*m)**e (mod n) >> oracle >> m&1

toyotama.crypto.util.factorize_from_kphi(n, kphi)¶

factorize by Miller-Rabin primality test n: p*q kphi: k*phi(n) = k*(p-1)*(q-1)

kphi = 2**r * s
